description: Try our easy to follow Pork, Apple & Capsicum Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork, Apple & Capsicum Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 green apples, cored and cut into chunks
2 tbs mint, chopped (plus whole leaves, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine wine, garlic, herbs, lemon juice and olive oil in a bowl. Add pork and mix well to combine. Cover and place in fridge to marinate for 1 hour.
Thread pork alternately with apple and capsicum onto skewers.
Heat a frying pan or chargrill over medium-high heat. Cook skewers in batches for 3 minutes each side or until pork is cooked and tender.
Place pork skewers on a platter, scatter with mint leaves and serve with salad, Lebanese bread and aioli (see tip).
